name: Magic Princess - Makeup & Dressup Girl Games
name_original: Magic Princess - Makeup & Dressup Girl Games
description:
Girls! Our latest game will brought you a new spa, make-up, and dress-up experience. Let's start the wonderful beauty journey of the magic fashion girl!

Game Instructions:

Have a relaxing spa to make sure her hair and skin are flawless. Next, you’ll see Beauty Room, here you can help her choose a hair style, eye color and put the makeup on. After that, you’ll come to the Dressing Room and assist her to select an amazing princess dress, gloves, stockings, shoes, and the matched accessories! Are you ready to show?
Game features:
Designed specifically for girls and children
It is fun and easy.
What are you waiting for? Download and enjoy it right away!
